mapper.select: select a.store_no from t_sys_store a, t_sys_user b where a.is_deleted = 0 and a.user_acct = b.user_acct and b.user_code = #{userCode}

SELECT c.user_name driverName, c.phone driverPhone FROM t_sys_driver a, t_sys_store b, t_sys_user c WHERE a.is_deleted = 0 and a.user_acct = c.user_acct AND a.province = b.province AND a.city = b.city AND a.area = b.area AND b.store_no = #{storeNo}
